New Records: Shadab Khan scored 52 runs with four sixes from 22 balls
Mohammed Haris hit three sixes in an 11-ball stay worth 28
Key Match Events: Mohammed Haris' 28 off 11 balls revived Pakistan's innings
Shadab Khan's 52 off 22 balls was a crucial contribution
Mohammed Wasim and Naseem Shah's fine death bowling helped restrict South Africa to 152/5 in 13 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam expressed hope that Pakistan's performance in the last two matches would be enough to secure a semi-final spot
Pakistan's captain emphasized the importance of their next match against Bangladesh
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam praised Mohammed Haris' performance and the contributions of Ifthikhar Ahmed and Shadab Khan
Captain Temba Bavuma demanded an improvement in South Africa's batting and fielding
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's win over South Africa kept their hopes of a semi-final spot alive
South Africa's fate is still in their own hands, with their final match against the Netherlands
Others: The match was delayed due to rain after the decisive over by Shadab Khan
David Miller was absent from the South Africa team due to a back injury
